channel.title: Will rep for help!
channel.description: ok on my server no matter what items you have equipped your bonus is 120 in everything even if you dont have any items equiped. it doesnt update when you log in then out, it is still 120 on other clients so it must be server sideif you can solve this for me i will rep you.

item.title: Will rep for help!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Edit item.CFG,the bonus’s are in there

item = 3140	Dragon_chainbody	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.	100000	100000	100000	0	0	0	-15	0	81	93	98	-3	82	0	0

the first 3 numbers are the price’s,the rest are the bonuses
